name: CGPSConverterCallbacks
desc: A structure for holding the callbacks provided when you create a PostScript converter object.

items.name: init(version: UInt32, beginDocument: CGPSConverterBeginDocumentCallback?, endDocument: CGPSConverterEndDocumentCallback?, beginPage: CGPSConverterBeginPageCallback?, endPage: CGPSConverterEndPageCallback?, noteProgress: CGPSConverterProgressCallback?, noteMessage: CGPSConverterMessageCallback?, releaseInfo: CGPSConverterReleaseInfoCallback?)
var beginDocument: CGPSConverterBeginDocumentCallback?
items.desc: The callback called at the beginning of the conversion of the PostScript document, or NULL.

items.name: var beginPage: CGPSConverterBeginPageCallback?
items.desc: The callback called at the start of the conversion of each page in the PostScript document, or NULL.

items.name: var endDocument: CGPSConverterEndDocumentCallback?
items.desc: The callback called at the end of conversion of the PostScript document, or NULL.

items.name: var endPage: CGPSConverterEndPageCallback?
items.desc: The callback called at the end of the conversion of each page in the PostScript document, or NULL.

items.name: var noteMessage: CGPSConverterMessageCallback?
items.desc: The callback called to pass any messages that might result during the conversion, or NULL.

items.name: var noteProgress: CGPSConverterProgressCallback?
items.desc: The callback called periodically during the conversion to indicate that conversion is proceeding, or NULL.

items.name: var releaseInfo: CGPSConverterReleaseInfoCallback?
items.desc: The callback called when the converter is deallocated, or NULL.

items.name: var version: UInt32
items.desc: The version number of the structure passed in as a parameter to the converter creation functions. The structure defined below is version 0.
